ModMetaData.name: BIRD UP! All-in-one
ModMetaData.author: Alex J
ModMetaData.description:
!!DO NOT USE IF YOU INSTALLED BIRD MODS SEPARATELY, might cause weird stuff!!
BIRD UP! All-in-one
Mod Version: 1.1
A modpack adding all the birds from BIRD UP! collection. Good for people with huge amount of mods.
